trans-unit.source: A helper class that creates <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence"></xref> instances.

Once created, the DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator creates new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> instances, sets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.InstanceId%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.SequenceId%2A> and increments the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.MessageNumber%2A> for each successive <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> instance created.
trans-unit.target: När du skapat DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator skapar nya <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence>instanser, anger de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.InstanceId%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.SequenceId%2A>och ökar den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.MessageNumber%2A>för varje efterföljande <xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence>instans som har skapats.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.MessageNumber%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.SequenceId%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence.InstanceId%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequence>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator"></xref> class with the specified instance ID and sequence ID.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Discovery.DiscoveryMessageSequenceGenerator"> </xref> klassen med det angivna instans-ID och sekvens-ID.
